product_name: Tune Belt Armband for Motorola Droid Mini and iPhone 5/ 5s/5c Slim Cases
long_description: This lightweight and comfortable Tune Belt armband for Motorola Droid Mini and iPhone 5/5s/ c slim cases lets you conveniently carry your smartphone while you workout and run. Designed to fit smartphones and/or protective cases that are 4.51 - 5 in. long and up to 2.75 in. wide; maximum device size that will fit is 6.5 in. in circumference. Armband will fit an iPhone 5, 5s or 5c in a slim protective case. Lightweight neoprene material is comfortable next to skin; neoprene provides cushion for your device and protects against perspiration and scratches. Clear protective window cover allows full control of your phone while it is stowed. Tune Belt armband adjusts to fit arms that measure 9 - 17 in. around; Armband Extender (not included) allows it to fit larger arm sizes.
short_description: This lightweight and comfortable Tune Belt armband for Motorola Droid Mini and iPhone 5/5s/ c slim cases lets you conveniently carry your smartphone while you workout and run.
